title: A major advance in crystal structure prediction.
abstract: noA crystal ball? A new method for crystal structure prediction combines a tailor-made force field with a density functional theory method incorporating a van der Waals correction for dispersive interactions. In a blind test, the method predicts the correct crystal structure for all four compounds, one of which is a cocrystal. The picture shows the predicted structure of one of the compounds in green and the experimental structure in blue
